name: JoinDM
short: DM newly joined users from your guild with your set message.
description: This cog uses TagScriptEngine and requires you basic tagscript knowledge to use this cog.
end_user_data_statement: Cog does not store any EUD.
install_msg: Thank you for installing joindm. Load the cog with `[p]load joindm`.
author: NoobInDaHause
